SCCL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 33 General Medical Consultant Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 16:03 IST
 Singareni Collieries Company Limited
 33 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 85,000 to 85,000




FOLLOW

The Singareni Collieries Company (SCCL) has released an official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 33 General Medical Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, and MDS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SCCL Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the deadline of the application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Telangana

SCCL Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
General Medical Consultant 	33	MBBS, BDS, MDS

Age Limit for the SCCL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 64 years

Selection Process for the SCCL Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the SCCL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 85,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the SCCL Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the SCCL Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the General Medical Consultant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	12-08-2025
Last Date of Application	25-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
